li.label: no food variety
li.description: I have to eat the same food every day. There is no variation.

li.label: one-sided food variety
li.description: The diet here is really one-sided. I want to eat more different kinds of food, but at least I don't have to eat the same every day.

li.label: unfulfilling food variety
li.description: We need more food variation. I can choose from a few foods, but it's not enough to make me happy.

li.label: satisfying food variety
li.description: There is a good variety of foods I can choose from to eat. Most times I can find something for my taste.

li.label: perfect food variety
li.description: Every day is a new food adventure. I can eat whatever I want and taste many different kinds of food. I love it!
